answers.answer: hi, by any chance are you on the pill or have contraceptive injections?, im 22 and when i was 18 i was on the pill and i started not wanting to have sex and had a very low sex drive, the injection had the same effects, now im not using contraception my sex drive is back to normal although it took some time!. a healthy diet also helps. adey

HI there,i was on the pill for 12 years nd my sex drive was non exsistant and I even wondered if i was a lebian, although i didnt fancy women but neither fancied sex with men!!!!!I am now 31 and came off the pill 2 years ago when me and my partner wanted to try for a baby and as soon as i came off the pill my sex drive went sky high and i was like a rampant rabbit!!! i dont know if it was the fact i was approching 30 and in my peak or coming off the pill!! or maybe not fancying my man at the time.he he but I still think the pill destroyed our sex life and we have been together for 13 years now!Good luck hun x

You may not want or feel ready for a baby at the moment so i wouldnt come off the pill if this is the case unless he uses anything but most men wint nowadays!I remember changing birth control pills to Yasmin and this pill also made me feel much more sexy. it was like viagra and I really noticed a difference and felt like a teenager again!!!.I really recommend this pill YASMIN and would ask your doctor to prescribe it. let me know if you do take it and if it works for you too. x

question: I have a very low sex drive and im only 21.  I was tested for low testostorne but it came back normal at a 13.  I would like to know what I can do to get that drive.  Should I be tested for anything else...besides thyroid or diabetes?
title: Low sex drive
